results.title: Continuous effort
results.description: The flame of effort. It is the application of diligence put into moment-to-moment continuity

results.title: Weak in effort
results.description: A slack, feeble application of energy. The mind shrinks from wholesome striving, dawdling in comfort and doubt. It can leave the path unattended and growth stalled.
